data-itemid="233680339" class="dropgrpPop"></div><span title="Pump Coupling" class="grpidrspan SLC_cp" id="grpidrspan_233680339" onclick="grouppop(233680339)">Pump Coupling</span><p style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_233680339"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(233680339);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(233680339)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Pump Coupling" onclick="opencatPopup(233680339);">Pump Coupling</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Jaw Couplings" onclick="opencatPopup(233680339);">Jaw Couplings</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(233680339)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_233680339" data-itemid="233680339" onclick="productdescpop(233680339)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">ROTEX®&nbsp;torsionally flexible jaw couplings&nbsp;are&nbsp;elastomer couplings&nbsp;characterized by a compact design.
In spite of low weights and mass moments of inertia of the&nbsp;elastomer couplings&nbsp;they are able to transmit high torques. The compact shaft couplings are characterized by a long service life and sound operating characteristics generated by allover machining.
Thanks to the elastomer (elastomer spider) between the coupling hubs of the&nbsp;jaw couplings&nbsp;shocks respectively torsional vibrations in the drive train are damped. The high temperature-resistant spider material&nbsp;T-PUR®&nbsp;(elastomer) is available in various degrees of hardness. The&nbsp;torsionally flexible ROTEX couplings&nbsp;are used in almost every range of general machinery and plant engineering. <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_233680339" data-itemid="233680339" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" id="specificationDiv233680339"><h2 style="display:inline;" onclick="openShowMorePopup(233680339);">Specification/Additional Details</h2><span title="Edit Specifications and Additional Details" onclick="openShowMorePopup(233680339);" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(276742964)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_276742964" data-itemid="276742964" onclick="productdescpop(276742964)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The EAS‑compact is a positive-locking, ratchetting, or disengaging torque limiter based on the ball-detent principle. The clutch protects the drive line from excessively high, unpermitted torque impacts which can occur due to unintentional blockages. <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_276742964" data-itemid="276742964" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" id="specificationDiv276742964"><h2 lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(250265107);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(250265107)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Flexible Shaft Couplings" onclick="opencatPopup(250265107);">Flexible Shaft Couplings</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Encoder Coupling" onclick="opencatPopup(250265107);">Encoder Coupling</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(250265107)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_250265107" data-itemid="250265107" onclick="productdescpop(250265107)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Our encoder couplings are mainly made of aluminum alloy, stainless Steel or nylon depending on the applications. They are machined from a single piece and have multiple spiral cuts to achieve the flexibility required to compensate the angular and offset misalignment also, at the same time the backlash is eliminated. These couplings are mainly used in connecting optical encoders and small motors up to a maximum speed to 8000 rpm. The bore sizes are available from 3mm to 20mm as standard. <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_250265107" id="descidrbtn_104876928" data-itemid="104876928" onclick="productdescpop(104876928)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">POLY-NORM®&nbsp;shaft couplings&nbsp;are characterized by a compact design.&nbsp;The torque is transmitted via elastomers between the cams&nbsp;also serving to offset displacements and dampen shocks and torsional vibrations.
Applications of our torsionally flexible, fail-safe shaft couplings: POLY-NORM shaft couplings&nbsp;are used in almost all fields of mechanical engineering, here mainly in the pump industry (pump coupling). <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_104876928" data-itemid="104876928" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> Coupling</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(275905534)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(275905534)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_275905534" data-itemid="275905534" onclick="productdescpop(275905534)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Couplings provide dynamic stability and vibration - free, smooth bearing loads, even at misaligned positions. Couplings find applications in petrochemicals plants, instrumentation, encoders, lead screws, ball screws, air cooling units, pumps, machine tools, CNC machines, duplicators, computer peripherals, wind power generators, anywhere there is a need for managing motion. <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_275905534" style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(104877264)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_104877264" data-itemid="104877264" onclick="productdescpop(104877264)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">BoWex curved-tooth gear couplings&nbsp;are&nbsp;flexible shaft connections&nbsp;for positive-locking torque transmission and particularly suitable for compensating for axial, radial and angular shaft displacements.
Operation according to the curved-tooth principle avoids edge pressure in the spline with angular and radial displacements, making&nbsp;BoWex curved-tooth gear couplings&nbsp;operate almost free from wear. <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_104877264" data-itemid="104877264" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(158837135)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_158837135" data-itemid="158837135" onclick="productdescpop(158837135)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">orque limiter without driving component - versatile
The RUFLEX standard torque limiter is a torque limiter without a driving component for every drive. It is versatile due to the construction kit system of the&nbsp;RUFLEX torque limiter.
The combination of this torque limiter (safety coupling) with the renowned KTR couplings&nbsp;ROTEX (flexible shaft coupling) or BoWex (gear coupling) and the integration of customized driving components (e. g. sprockets)&nbsp;allows for overload protection optimally adjusted to the respective application." <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_158837135" data-itemid="158837135" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" id="specificationDiv158837135"><h2
